text: The 13th Letter is a 1951 American mystery movie directed by Otto Preminger and is a remake of the 1943 French movie Le Corbeau. It stars Linda Darnell, Charles Boyer, Michael Rennie, Constance Smith, Judith Evelyn and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 movies Category:1950s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Otto Preminger
title: The 13th Letter
